Package cscd212classes.boards

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscd212classes.boards.GameBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EarthBoard, FantasyBoard, MarsBoard
    public abstract class GameBoard
extends Object
    The abstract class representing a generic game board

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected ArrayList<LifeForm> enemyLifeForms
      An arraylist of enemy LifeForms
      protected LifeForm player
      The player LifeForm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameBoard​(DifficultyLevel difficultyLevel)
      The explicit value constructor that recieves a difficulty level and creates the game board by first creating an empty arraylist, then creating the life forms by calling the appropriate subclass createLifeForms method, adjusting the difficulty level and finally trimming the enemy life forms arraylist to the proper size

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void adjustForDifficulty​(DifficultyLevel difficultyLevel)
      This method adjusts the enemies life points based on the difficulty level of the game.
      protected abstract void createLifeForms()
      This abstract method is overridden in all the subclasses of GameBoard
      ArrayList<LifeForm> getEnemyLifeForms()
      The getEnemyLifeForms returns the ArrayList of LifeForms that represent the enemies
      LifeForm getPlayer()
      The getPlayer method returns the current player

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • enemyLifeForms

        protected final ArrayList<LifeForm> enemyLifeForms
        An arraylist of enemy LifeForms

      • player

        protected LifeForm player
        The player LifeForm

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(DifficultyLevel difficultyLevel)
        The explicit value constructor that recieves a difficulty level and creates the game board by first creating an empty arraylist, then creating the life forms by calling the appropriate subclass createLifeForms method, adjusting the difficulty level and finally trimming the enemy life forms arraylist to the proper size
        Parameters:
        difficultyLevel - Representing the base difficulty level

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public LifeForm getPlayer()
        The getPlayer method returns the current player
        Returns:
        LifeForm Representing the current player

      • getEnemyLifeForms

        public ArrayList<LifeForm> getEnemyLifeForms()
        The getEnemyLifeForms returns the ArrayList of LifeForms that represent the enemies
        Returns:
        ArrayList Representing the arraylist of enemies

      • createLifeForms

        protected abstract void createLifeForms()
        This abstract method is overridden in all the subclasses of GameBoard

      • adjustForDifficulty

        protected void adjustForDifficulty​(DifficultyLevel difficultyLevel)
        This method adjusts the enemies life points based on the difficulty level of the game. The more difficult the game is, the more life points are awarded to the enemies. this method first grabs each enemy's life points, it then multiplies those life points by the difficulty level modifier. Finally, a cast is made (to an int) and individual enemy's life points are set
        Parameters:
        difficultyLevel - Representing the difficulty level
